text: Ivan Bohatyr (; born 24 April 1975) is a former Ukrainian footballer and Ukrainian football manager.Ivan Bohatyr is a new head coach of Metalurh Zaporizhia (Иван Богатырь – новый главный тренер запорожского Металлурга). UA- Football. 25 June 2019 In 1994 – 2002 he played for FC Metalurh Zaporizhia.Metalurh Zaporizhia was transferred to the First League: its first game will take place on 27 July (Запорожский «Металлург» перешел в Первую лигу: первый матч состоится 27 июля). 061.ua. 26 July 2019 == References == ==External links== * * Category:1975 births Category:Living people Category:Footballers from Zaporizhia Category:Ukrainian footballers Category:Ukrainian Premier League players Category:Ukraine under-21 international footballers Category:FC Viktor Zaporizhya players Category:FC Metalurh Zaporizhya players Category:FC Metalurh-2 Zaporizhya players Category:SSSOR Metalurh Zaporizhia players Category:SC Tavriya Simferopol players Category:FC Metalist Kharkiv players Category:MFC Mykolaiv players Category:FC Oleksandriya players Category:FC Desna Chernihiv players Category:Ukrainian football managers Category:FC Metalurh Zaporizhya managers Category:Association football defenders Category:Association football midfielders
title: Ivan Bohatyr
